title: LIBERALISM, REPUBLICANISM, & VIOLENCE
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary:
I present an original account of how my J S Mill Style liberalism might fit together with my 'Neo-Machiavellian' Republicanism.  The context is a consideration of social norms around speech and violence but I develop this into a larger theory of how to normatively understand American politics.
